    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2657</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Farsightedness</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Farsightedness</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Farsightedness</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Farsightedness</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Farsightedness</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Farsightedness</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Farsightedness</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which shows how the farsighted eye focuses light and forms an image, and demonstrates its correction with a lens</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">physics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">optics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">human biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vision</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation, die wie das farsighted Auge 
Fokuslicht zeigt und ein Bild bildet und zeigt seine Korrektur mit 
einem Objektiv</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation qui montre comment la lumière 
prévoyante de foyers d'oeil et forme une image, et démontre sa 
correction avec un objectif</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que mostre como a luz farsighted dos
focos do olho e dê forma a uma imagem, e demonstra sua correção com
uma lente</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che mostra come la luce farsighted
dei fuochi dell'occhio e forma un'immagine e dimostra la relativa 
correzione con un obiettivo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που εμφανίζει πώς το διορατικό μάτι 
στρέφει το φως και διαμορφώνει μια εικόνα, και καταδεικνύει τη 
διόρθωσή της με έναν φακό</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que muestra cómo la luz 
clarividente de los focos del ojo y forma una imagen, y demuestra su 
corrección con una lente</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Optik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
